name: SubstanceProtein.numberOfSubunits
title: SubstanceProtein.numberOfSubunits
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Number of linear sequences of amino acids linked through peptide bonds. The number of subunits constituting the SubstanceProtein shall be described. It is possible that the number of subunits can be variable
element.definition: Number of linear sequences of amino acids linked through peptide bonds. The number of subunits constituting the SubstanceProtein shall be described. It is possible that the number of subunits can be variable.
